DOC.brief_title: Effect Treatment With Insulin VIAjectTM Compared Regular Human Insulin Insulin Lispro Mealtime Blood Vessel Stress Patients With Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Type 2 diabetes mellitus accord ADA criterion 2 . HbA1c 6.5 % 9.9 % 3 . Treatment sulfonylurea and/or metformin stable dosage within last 3 month 4 . Age 40 75 year 5 . BMI < 40 1 . Type 1 diabetes mellitus 2 . Pretreatment insulin within last 6 month prior screen 3 . Pretreatment PPARyagonists glucosidase inhibitor within last 4 week prior screen 4 . Untreated hypertension stage IIIII accord WHO criteria 5 . Planned anticipated change antidiabetic and/or concomitant medication study participation 6 . Total cholesterol > 300 mg/dl ( anamnestically ) 7 . Major micro macrovascular complication judge investigator 8 . Tobacco use within last 6 month prior screen 9 . Drugs major impact endothelial function like nitrate etc . 10 . History drug alcohol abuse opinion investigator impair subject safety protocol compliance 11 . History hypersensitivity study drug drug similar chemical structure 12 . History severe multiple allergy 13 . Treatment investigational drug within 3 month prior screen 14 . Progressive fatal disease 15 . History significant cardiovascular , respiratory , gastrointestinal , hepatic ( ALAT and/or ASAT > 3 time normal reference range ) , renal ( creatinine > 1.1 mg/dL woman > 1.5 mg/dL men ) , neurological , psychiatric and/or haematological disease judge investigator 16 . Pregnancy breast feed 17 . Sexually active woman childbearing potential consistently correctly practice birth control implant , injectables , oral contraceptive , hormonal intrauterine device ( IUDs ) , sexual abstinence vasectomise partner 18 .
